alert.note: Alert for Eastern Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 21 at 11:58AM EST until November 21 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations around a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Tucker County. * WHEN...Until 3 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
